name: H.I.S.C
description:
HISC is a game made by a one man team (Shelegio).
This is a hack 'n' slash with some fun parkour elements and is still in development.
Here is a playable test demo of the game.
Story:
The game is set in a distant future, where humans have created a cyborg and are testing its abilities in combat and traversal. The cyborg is Coded with a name : 2TashKhia.
The AI is written in a way to make the cyborg surpass human abilities in thinking and me the ultimate battle/Rescue machine.
More about the story coming soon.
enjoy the game and be sure to leave some feedback.
